articles.title: ‘Stop committing this Gunah’: Islamists attack Pakistani cricketer for wishing Holi to Hindus - OpIndia
articles.description: Pakistani cricketer draws hate on Twitter after wishing Holi to Hindus. | OpIndia News
articles.content: Shahnawaz Dahani wished Holi to Hindus but he didn’t know that the Islamist Twitter mob will come after him. Dahani, a right-arm fast bowler from Pakistan, tweeted, “To all the lovely people around t… [+2340 chars]
